item.title: WatchKit Framework
item.author: contact@rogermolas.com (Roger Molas)
item.description: WatchKit is the new framework created by Apple for Apple Watch development, WatchKit is available starting Xcode 6.2 and iOS 8.2. Analogous to UIKit for iOS apps, the framework allows developers to drop in custom interfaces and interact with your existing iOS app. When app is launched on Apple Watch, the WatchKit extension on iPhone runs in the background to update the user interface and respond to user interactions. WatchKit framework provides three opportunities to extend your iPhone app to Apple Watch:Â WatchKit app, Glances, and actionable Notifications.
